recipe.title: Bacon and Fried Egg Sandwiches
ingredients: 4 wedges of focaccia or 4 English muffins, split, toasted
instructions: Spread cut sides of focaccia with honey mustard. Arrange bottom halves on 2 plates. Cook bacon slices in heavy large skillet over medium-high heat until brown and crisp. Transfer to paper towel and drain briefly; arrange bacon slices atop focaccia bottoms.

Pour drippings from skillet; melt butter in same skillet over medium-high heat until foamy. Crack eggs into skillet. Cover and cook eggs to desired doneness; sprinkle with salt and pepper. Using spatula, transfer 1 egg to each focaccia bottom. Place arugula on each, then cover with focaccia top.
